constraints.name: degree_upper_bound
constraints.description: 每个节点的每种颜色边的数量不超过1（度数约束）
constraints.formal: ∀v ∈ V, ∀c ∈ [1, M], |{e ∈ E | e.color = c ∧ (e.u = v ∨ e.v = v)}| ≤ 1

constraints.name: path_constraint
constraints.description: 存在一条从起点到终点的路径，且路径上的每条边的颜色在给定的颜色序列中唯一出现（路径约束）
constraints.formal: ∃ path from 1 to N such that ∀e ∈ path, e.color is unique in the given color sequence

constraints.name: cost_minimization
constraints.description: 最小化改变边颜色的总代价（优化目标）
constraints.formal: minimize Σ P_i for edges whose colors are changed
